bropals.lib.simplegame.entity

Class BaseEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • bropals.lib.simplegame.entity.BaseEntity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseComponentEntity, BlockEntity, VertexShape

    public abstract class BaseEntity
extends java.lang.Object
    The most simple type of Entity.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public abstract void update()
        Updates this entity. Meant to be overridden and implemented in a subclass.

      • render

        public abstract void render(java.lang.Object graphicsObj)
        Render this entity. Meant to be overridden and implemented in a subclass.
        Parameters:
        graphicsObj - The graphics object being used to draw this.

      • getParent

        public GameWorld getParent()
        Get the parent of the entity.
        Returns:
        The parent of the entity

      • setParent

        public void setParent(GameWorld parent)
        Set the parent of the entity
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent of the entity.

      • removeParent

        public void removeParent()
        Set the parent of this entity to null. This will cause GameWorld to remove this Entity when it reaches it in the update loop.
